cards.title: Hook
cards.description: Open with a compelling moment that draws the viewer in.

cards.title: Subject Introduction
cards.description: Introduce the main subject/person and their world.

cards.title: The Challenge
cards.description: Present the main problem or challenge being faced.

cards.title: Stakes
cards.description: Show what's at stake and why it matters.

cards.title: Day-in-the-Life
cards.description: Follow the subject through their daily routine.

cards.title: Obstacles
cards.description: Document specific barriers and challenges encountered.

cards.title: Turning Point
cards.description: A key moment of realization or change.

cards.title: Hope & Vision
cards.description: Present the solution or path forward.

cards.title: Potential Impact
cards.description: Show how the solution could change things.

cards.title: Reflection
cards.description: Subject reflects on their experience and hopes.

cards.title: Call to Action
cards.description: End with a message or call to action for viewers.
